body:
Hi Carsten,


Thanks for pointing out  the right direction again.
I replaced the line with:


refl = (1-multi)^9 ;


Works fine now, just a few days before my holidays :)
Now I  have it , it looks so simple, and the my question almost stupid.
Thanks!


Iebele
